In the World

Upcoming

I plan to have no public-facing engagements until 20 March 2021 (the Spring Equinox).

2020

  • Webinar hosted by Harvard Divinity School + Sacred Design Lab: “Commitment in community: what does Bonhoeffer’s monasticism have to say to us today?” (9 Dec 2020)
  • Webinar hosted by United for a Fair Economy: Personal and Collective Healing for Liberation (8 Oct 2020)
  • Webinar hosted by CoCreative: Narrative - Personal, Political, Planetary (24 Sept 2020)

  • Hey Mom: Resources and strategies for recruiting white family as allies for Black liberation (5 June 2020)
  • The Wilds Beyond Climate Justice: 2-part workshop - Unleashing Alternative Futures (June 3 & 4 2020)
  • How We Show Up: Reclaiming Family, Friendship, and Community by Mia Birdsong (friendship permaculture is included in the book) (2 Jun 2020)
  • The Full Set w Lawrence Barriner, II (15 May 2020)
  • Pax Christi: Reflection for Holy Thursday, April 9 (9 April 2020)
  • Pleasure Activism & Story-based Strategy: A Conversation with Jess St. Louis & Lawrence Barriner (14 Feb 2020)
  • Gibrán Rivera’s Show: Men Need to be Held (23 Jan 2020)
